ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by the Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES), Brazil) (grant number: Finance Code 001 88887.363006/2019-00) and the Carlos Chagas Filho Foundation for Research Support of the State of Rio de Janeiro (Fundação Carlos Chagas Filho de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (FAPERJ)) (grant number: E-26/010.001759/2019). The APC was funded by Oswaldo Cruz Institute (Instituto Oswaldo Cruz (IOC)). Dr. Fernando Almeida-Souza is postdoctoral researcher fellow of CAPES (grant no. 88887.363006/2019-00). Dr. Ana Lucia Abreu-Silva is research productivity fellow of National Scientific and Technological Development Council (Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq)) (grant no. 309885/2017-5).
